overview: Eugene, an aspiring writer from Brooklyn, is drafted into the US Army during the final months of World War II. For his basic training, the Army sends him to Camp Shelby in Mississippi, where toil, bad food, and antisemitic jibes await. Eugene takes refuge in his sense of humor and in his diary, but they won't protect him in a battle of wills with an unstable drill sergeant.
tagline: The Army made Eugene a man. But Daisy gave him basic training!
cast: Matthew Broderick|Christopher Walken|Matt Mulhern|Corey Parker|Markus Flanagan
